channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins SiteMonitor Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins SiteMonitor Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-28153|2024-08-03T05:48:37.236Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20sitemonitor%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins SiteMonitor Plugin 0.6 and earlier does not escape URLs of sites to monitor in tooltips, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.
